steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the table where you want to add or remove borders.
To add borders, select the table by clicking and dragging over it.
Go to the 'Table Tools' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Borders' button in the 'Table Styles' group.
Choose the desired border style from the drop-down menu.
To remove borders, select the table by clicking and dragging over it.
Go to the 'Table Tools' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Borders' button in the 'Table Styles' group.
Select 'No Border' from the drop-down menu.
Save the changes to the document.
